item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• A portfolio focused theme for creative folks
    Purchase Now
0
Themes Sales

Join our 96,000+ satisfied customers

We are experienced and well established Themeforest author for more than 5 years. We are one of the best support author on the market.

Grand Portfolio is a Portfolio Focus Design Tool

When we design and create Grand Portfolio theme. We want to provide you tools for building portfolio focus site. So we craftly created designed demos which built with our theme options and features and no coding required. Each demos are included for free and can be easily imported with one click using our theme admin.

Creative & Design Agency

Fashion Designer

Blogger

Photographer

Music Band & Singer

Architect

Magazine & Publisher

New Demo (Soon)

 

Various Portfolio Content Options

When we created this theme. We are focused on gallery & portfolio modules so you can show your works uniquely and require simple steps to created from creative agency, photographer, musician & singer, fashion design, architect and more.

 

Blog & Magazine

Theme support various options & layouts for blogger including many post type ex. videos, images and gallery


Music & Event

Portfolio Module can also use for musician band or singer albums and their biography with event/reservation support


Fullscreen Gallery

This feature is specially built for photographer, architect who want to show off their work in fullscreen size


Infinite Scroll

For large amount of gallery or portfolio content. once your visitors scroll down to end of page. It will automatically load new items


Built for Architect

We love beautiful architecture so we want to create a clean portfolio layout for architects to show off their works


Shop Support

We support Woocommerce plugin for e-commerce solution. You can sell various type of products using the theme.


Layout Options

Theme layouts are very flexible. We provided various of menu options. You can choose
from left align classic menu, center align menu, transparent menu etc and others layout options

item.title: Content Builder
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Build your own layouts with content builder

Theme comes with a drag&drop content builder which helps you to build various layouts and contents. You can use easy to use drag&drop user interface to place elements and contents you like. You can also easily import demo site page layout too

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Theme Support & Updates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Free Support & Updates

When you purchased theme you get free theme support and updates. We are very focus to offer best support experience possible for you and you always doing that. We provide our own support portal and searchable theme documentation. Our support staffs usually answer all tickets within less than 14 hours.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: One Click Import
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
One Click Import

For WordPress beginner. It might not be easy to start setting up site so we provide import functionality to theme. You can import all demo contents in just single click, it’s not only demo contents are imported but also customisation settings as well.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: 40+ Gallery Templates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Gallery Templates Options

Theme comes with multiple gallery templates layouts for different purposes. You can choose to display fullscreen slideshow, parallax, flow, masonry and classic gallery columns or even mixes between various gallery layouts.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: 30+ Portfolio Templates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Portfolio Templates Options

Theme comes with multiple portfolio templates layouts for different purposes. You can choose to display fullscreen slideshow, parallax, masonry and classic portfolio columns or even mixes between various portfolio layouts.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Amazing Portfolio Contents
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Theme comes with a drag&drop content builder which helps you to build various layouts and contents. You can use easy to use drag&drop user interface to place elements and contents you like. So it’s easy for you to create amazing portfolio content just like demo site you saw here.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Fullscreen Video Support
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Support Fullscreen Youtube & Vimeo Video

Theme support Youtube and Vimeo video embed to page and post content. However theme also provide option to displays Youtube & Vimeo video fullscreen automatically so your video content even more beautiful for your customers.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: 9 Blog Templates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Blog Layouts Options

Theme comes with multiple blog layouts for different purposes. You can use blog templates to display news update, blog post or news. It has various layouts including full width, grid and with sidebar option.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Flexible Single Post Options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Single Post Layouts, Gallery and Media Support

Theme comes with multiple single blog post layouts for different purposes. You can display post content with images, gallery slideshow or with other video sources ex. Youtube, Vimeo

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Event Options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Event Options With Map and Directions

Theme comes with event module so you can create an event about your photography exhibition etc. It also has map with direction option and you can also add link to purchase URL if your event is required buyer ticket.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: 11 Menu Layout Combinations
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Various Menu Options

Theme comes with multiple menu layouts for different purposes. For example Left Menu is also one option so you can display navigation in vertical alignment. You can also mixed left menu layout with other layout options including top bar, widgets etc.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Free Premium Plugins
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Theme include two of the most popular premium plugins on WordPress platform ($34 valued FREE) you can create image, video and text content with amazing animation easily using drag&drop user interface of Revolution Slider plugin and iLightbox, a mobile gesture friendly lightbox plugin.

item.title: Custom Sidebar
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Custom Sidebar

Theme has predefined sidebars but if you want to create a new one for other purpose. You can easily do that via our theme admin panel. Once you created a new sidebar, you can customise its widgets & contents via WordPress widgets page.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Instant Search
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Instant Search

To help your site visitor find what they are looking for in very fast way is to use instant search. So it searches your site contents while visitors are typing and displays results instantly. Visitors can click to page/post to view content or view full search result page.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Theme Customizer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Theme Customizer

Customise everything in the theme via customizer and it previews your changes instantly. Other themes might have support some parts and you have to switch between customiser and theme setting. But we are the theme which fully built every cusomisable options into WordPress customiser

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: One Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
One Page

Theme provide support for you to create modern one page parallax site or micro site, you can also create micro site for your sub pages easily using drag&drop content builder with custom menu system.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Side Menu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Side Menu

Theme has 4 menu options main, top bar, footer and side menus. With side menu you can organise each menu items and it’s primary menu for mobile devices. You can also add widgets to its sidebar.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Woocommerce Support
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Open Your Shop

Theme is Woocommerce compatible and provide flexible shop layout support fullwidth or with sidebar templates. You can easily create and maintain your online shop. For example photography & Photo frame or other shop.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better

item.title: Google Mobile Friendly
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Compatible Google Mobile Friendly

Not only theme provide responsive layout. It also pass Google mobile compatibility check for best mobile experience and also great for SEO ranking for you website.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Check out theme features which make this theme better
